en.title: FE Featured On Malaysia National TV Channel RTM1!
en.content:
FE was featured on Malaysian National TV Channel RTM1 (Bahasa Malaysia) at the "Reaching Beyond The Horizon" Event at Bukit Jalil Golf and Country Resort, Kuala Lumpur, on 19th February 2009. The Event was officiated by YB Encik Jelaing a/k Mersad, Deputy Minister of Domestic Trade and Consumer Affairs, Malaysia. 
 
Click Here to View Video on TV RTM1 (Bahasa Malaysia)
